ADCBUF Driver External Data Structures

The section has a list of all the data structures which are exposed to the application. More...

Data Structures

struct  ADCBuf_Conversion_t
 An ADCBuf_Conversion data structure is used with ADCBuf_convert(). It indicates which channel to perform the ADC conversion on, how many conversions to make, and where to put them. The arg variable is an user-definable argument which gets passed to the ADCBuf_Callback when the ADC driver is in ADCBuf_RETURN_MODE_CALLBACK. More...

typedef struct ADCBuf_Conversion_t ADCBuf_Conversion
 An ADCBuf_Conversion data structure is used with ADCBuf_convert(). It indicates which channel to perform the ADC conversion on, how many conversions to make, and where to put them. The arg variable is an user-definable argument which gets passed to the ADCBuf_Callback when the ADC driver is in ADCBuf_RETURN_MODE_CALLBACK.

Enumerations

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the data structures which are exposed to the application.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct ADCBuf_Config_t ADCBuf_Config

ADCBuf Global configuration.

The ADCBuf_Config structure contains a set of pointers used to characterise the ADC driver implementation.

This structure needs to be defined before calling ADCBuf_init() and it must not be changed thereafter.

See also
ADCBuf_init()
typedef struct ADCBuf_CQConf_t ADCBuf_CQConf

Chirp Quality(CQ) configuration Parameters.

The structure is used to define Chirp Quality configuration.

typedef struct ADCBuf_dataFormat_t ADCBuf_dataFormat

ADC Buffer data format Parameters.

The structure is used to define ADC Buffer data format.

typedef struct ADCBuf_Params_t ADCBuf_Params

ADC Parameters.

ADC Parameters are used to with the ADCBuf_open() call. Default values for these parameters are set using ADCBuf_Params_init().

See also
ADCBuf_Params_init()
typedef struct ADCBuf_RxChanConf_t ADCBuf_RxChanConf

ADC Buffer RX channel configuration Parameters.

The structure is used to define ADC Buffer RX Channel configuration.

typedef struct ADCBuf_rxTestPatternConf_t ADCBuf_rxTestPatternConf

ADC Buffer test pattern configuration Parameters.

The structure is used to define ADC Buffer test pattern configuration.

typedef struct ADCBuf_TestPatternConf_t ADCBuf_TestPatternConf

ADC Buffer test pattern configuration Parameters.

The structure is used to define ADC Buffer test pattern configuration.

typedef enum ADCBufMMWave_CMD_e ADCBufMMWave_CMD

ADCBUF Command.

The structure is used to define ADCBUF driver commands.

typedef enum ADCBufMMWave_CQType_e ADCBufMMWave_CQType

ADCBUF CQ monitoring type.

The structure is used to define CQ monitoring types.

typedef enum ADCBufSource_e ADCBufSource

ADCBUF Source selection.

The structure is used to define ADCBUF driver commands.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ADCBufMMWave_CMD_e

ADCBUF Command.

The structure is used to define ADCBUF driver commands.

Enumerator
ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_SRC 

set ADCBUF source, it can be DFE or VIN. The size of the argument size for this command is 4 bytes

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_CHIRP_THRESHHOLD 

Set number of Chirps to be stored in each Ping and Pong buffer. It should be programmed one less the actual number needed . The size of the argument size for this command is 4 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_PING_CHIRP_THRESHHOLD 

Set number of Chirps to be stored in each Ping buffer. It should be programmed one less the actual number needed . The size of the argument size for this command is 4 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_PONG_CHIRP_THRESHHOLD 

Set number of Chirps to be stored in each Pong buffer. It should be programmed one less the actual number needed . The size of the argument size for this command is 4 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_SET_CONTINUOUS_MODE 

Enables/Disables Continuous mode for ADCBUF. 1 to enable continuous mode. The size of the argument size for this command is 4 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_START_CONTINUOUS_MODE 

Starts Continuous mode for ADCBUF. Number of Samples to store in Ping/Pong buffer needs to be provided. The size of the argument size for this command is 4 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_STOP_CONTINUOUS_MODE 

Stops Continuous mode for ADCBUF. The size of the argument size for this command is 0 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CONF_DATA_FORMAT 

Configures ADCBUF data format. The size of the argument size for this command is size of ADCBuf_dataFormat.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CHANNEL_ENABLE 

Enable RX channels and configures the address offset in ADCBUF for the channel. The size of the argument size for this command is size of ADCBuf_RxChanConf.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CHANNEL_DISABLE 

Disable RX channels specified with RX channel bitmask The size of the argument size for this command is 4 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CONF_TEST_PATTERN 

Test pattern configuration. The size of the argument size for this command is size of ADCBuf_TestPatternConf.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_START_TEST_PATTERN 

Starts Test pattern generation. Reboot is required when switching from Test pattern mode to normal operation mode. The size of the argument size for this command is 0 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_STOP_TEST_PATTERN 

Stops Test pattern generation. The size of the argument size for this command is 0 bytes.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_CONF_CQ 

Chirp Quality configuration. The size of the argument size for this command is size of ADCBuf_CQConf.

ADCBufMMWave_CMD_LAST 

Last command.

enum ADCBufMMWave_CQType_e

ADCBUF CQ monitoring type.

The structure is used to define CQ monitoring types.

Enumerator
ADCBufMMWave_CQType_CQ0 

CQ type for CQ0.

ADCBufMMWave_CQType_CQ1 

CQ type for CQ1.

ADCBufMMWave_CQType_CQ2 

CQ type for CQ2.

ADCBufMMWave_CQType_MAX_CQ 

Maximum number of CQ which can be supported.

enum ADCBufSource_e

ADCBUF Source selection.

The structure is used to define ADCBUF driver commands.

Enumerator
ADCBUF_SOURCE_DFE 

Select DFE as source.

ADCBUF_SOURCE_HIL 

Select HIL as source.
